Industries
Marine Insurance
Comprehensive marine insurance solutions
At Risk Strategies, we provide specialized marine insurance solutions designed to safeguard your vessels, yachts, and maritime operations. Our team of marine insurance professionals brings extensive industry knowledge and a deep commitment to serving both the marine industry and individual yacht owners.
We partner with our marine clients to develop custom insurance solutions and risk management programs which provide optimal coverage and improved risk profiles without compromise.
Commercial marine insurance
Efficiently managing the risks of commercial marine operations requires specialized coverage crafted to meet the demands of the industry. Our comprehensive suite of solutions offers protection across a wide range of activities and assets:
Aquaculture
– Safeguard your aquaculture operations with coverage tailored to protect against environmental and operational risks.
Cargo & Transit Insurance Solutions
– Ensure your cargo remains protected during transit, whether by sea, land, or air.
Crew Medical Insurance
– Provide essential medical coverage for your crew, ensuring their wellbeing while operating at sea.
Hull & Machinery
– Protect your commercial vessels against physical damage to key components like the hull and machinery.
Marine Claims Service
– Depend on prompt, efficient claims services to minimize disruption to your operations.
Marine Construction
– Secure your marine construction projects with insurance designed for this specialized field.
Marine Liability
– Mitigate risks with comprehensive liability insurance for various marine operations.
Ports & Terminals
– Protect operational assets critical to maritime logistics at ports and terminals.
Protection & Indemnity
– Benefit from coverage that addresses third-party liabilities such as collisions, pollution, and passenger injuries.
Recreational Marine
– Comprehensive insurance for marine businesses tailored to address unique risks, coastal challenges, and complex exposures.
Yacht Club Insurance:
The Burgee Program - comprehensive insurance program developed to meet the distinctive needs of yacht clubs, community programs, and sailing organizations.
Yacht insurance
Yacht ownership is a reflection of your passion for the water and nautical lifestyle. Whether you own a mega yacht, sportfish boat, motor yacht, racing sailing boat, high-performance center console, or long-range trawler, we have the insurance solutions you need.
Our range of specialized offerings and custom insurance solutions ensure unmatched coverage and peace of mind for yacht owners, regardless of yacht type or navigation plans. Our specialty yacht insurance solutions include:
Boat & Yachts
–  Marine insurance solutions for all types of boats and yachts.
Mega Yachts
– Comprehensive protection for large luxury yachts that require highly specialized coverage.
Cruiser Insurance
– Tailored coverage for long-range and liveaboard cruisers, designed to protect you and your yacht on extended voyages and when living aboard.
One-Design Insurance
– Custom insurance policy for one-design sailboats under 30 feet, including racing coverage and worldwide navigation options.
Sailors Health Insurance
– Specialized health insurance solutions with worldwide overage for professional sailors, coaches, instructors, Olympic team members, collegiate sailing athletes, paid crew/captains, and international cruisers.
US Sailing Member Insurance Solutions
– Customized insurance offerings for US Sailing members including the Burgee Program for Yacht Clubs.
Tailored coverage for all of your marine needs
Navigating marine insurance doesn’t have to be complicated. Discover tailored solutions for

Industries
Marine Insurance
Comprehensive marine insurance solutions
At Risk Strategies, we provide specialized marine insurance solutions designed to safeguard your vessels, yachts, and maritime operations. Our team of marine insurance professionals brings extensive industry knowledge and a deep commitment to serving both the marine industry and individual yacht owners.
We partner with our marine clients to develop custom insurance solutions and risk management programs which provide optimal coverage and improved risk profiles without compromise.
Commercial marine insurance
Efficiently managing the risks of commercial marine operations requires specialized coverage crafted to meet the demands of the industry. Our comprehensive suite of solutions offers protection across a wide range of activities and assets:
Aquaculture
– Safeguard your aquaculture operations with coverage tailored to protect against environmental and operational risks.
Cargo & Transit Insurance Solutions
– Ensure your cargo remains protected during transit, whether by sea, land, or air.
Crew Medical Insurance
– Provide essential medical coverage for your crew, ensuring their wellbeing while operating at sea.
Hull & Machinery
– Protect your commercial vessels against physical damage to key components like the hull and machinery.
Marine Claims Service
– Depend on prompt, efficient claims services to minimize disruption to your operations.
Marine Construction
– Secure your marine construction projects with insurance designed for this specialized field.
Marine Liability
– Mitigate risks with comprehensive liability insurance for various marine operations.
Ports & Terminals
– Protect operational assets critical to maritime logistics at ports and terminals.
Protection & Indemnity
– Benefit from coverage that addresses third-party liabilities such as collisions, pollution, and passenger injuries.
Recreational Marine
– Comprehensive insurance for marine businesses tailored to address unique risks, coastal challenges, and complex exposures.
Yacht Club Insurance:
The Burgee Program - comprehensive insurance program developed to meet the distinctive needs of yacht clubs, community programs, and sailing organizations.
Yacht insurance
Yacht ownership is a reflection of your passion for the water and nautical lifestyle. Whether you own a mega yacht, sportfish boat, motor yacht, racing sailing boat, high-performance center console, or long-range trawler, we have the insurance solutions you need.
Our range of specialized offerings and custom insurance solutions ensure unmatched coverage and peace of mind for yacht owners, regardless of yacht type or navigation plans. Our specialty yacht insurance solutions include:
Boat & Yachts
–  Marine insurance solutions for all types of boats and yachts.
Mega Yachts
– Comprehensive protection for large luxury yachts that require highly specialized coverage.
Cruiser Insurance
– Tailored coverage for long-range and liveaboard cruisers, designed to protect you and your yacht on extended voyages and when living aboard.
One-Design Insurance
– Custom insurance policy for one-design sailboats under 30 feet, including racing coverage and worldwide navigation options.
Sailors Health Insurance
– Specialized health insurance solutions with worldwide overage for professional sailors, coaches, instructors, Olympic team members, collegiate sailing athletes, paid crew/captains, and international cruisers.
US Sailing Member Insurance Solutions
– Customized insurance offerings for US Sailing members including the Burgee Program for Yacht Clubs.
Tailored coverage for all of your marine needs
Navigating marine insurance doesn’t have to be complicated. Discover tailored solutions for
commercial marine insurance
or
yacht insurance

Industries
Marine Insurance
Comprehensive marine insurance solutions
At Risk Strategies, we provide specialized marine insurance solutions designed to safeguard your vessels, yachts, and maritime operations. Our team of marine insurance professionals brings extensive industry knowledge and a deep commitment to serving both the marine industry and individual yacht owners.
We partner with our marine clients to develop custom insurance solutions and risk management programs which provide optimal coverage and improved risk profiles without compromise.
Commercial marine insurance
Efficiently managing the risks of commercial marine operations requires specialized coverage crafted to meet the demands of the industry. Our comprehensive suite of solutions offers protection across a wide range of activities and assets:
Aquaculture
– Safeguard your aquaculture operations with coverage tailored to protect against environmental and operational risks.
Cargo & Transit Insurance Solutions
– Ensure your cargo remains protected during transit, whether by sea, land, or air.
Crew Medical Insurance
– Provide essential medical coverage for your crew, ensuring their wellbeing while operating at sea.
Hull & Machinery
– Protect your commercial vessels against physical damage to key components like the hull and machinery.
Marine Claims Service
– Depend on prompt, efficient claims services to minimize disruption to your operations.
Marine Construction
– Secure your marine construction projects with insurance designed for this specialized field.
Marine Liability
– Mitigate risks with comprehensive liability insurance for various marine operations.
Ports & Terminals
– Protect operational assets critical to maritime logistics at ports and terminals.
Protection & Indemnity
– Benefit from coverage that addresses third-party liabilities such as collisions, pollution, and passenger injuries.
Recreational Marine
– Comprehensive insurance for marine businesses tailored to address unique risks, coastal challenges, and complex exposures.
Yacht Club Insurance:
The Burgee Program - comprehensive insurance program developed to meet the distinctive needs of yacht clubs, community programs, and sailing organizations.
Yacht insurance
Yacht ownership is a reflection of your passion for the water and nautical lifestyle. Whether you own a mega yacht, sportfish boat, motor yacht, racing sailing boat, high-performance center console, or long-range trawler, we have the insurance solutions you need.
Our range of specialized offerings and custom insurance solutions ensure unmatched coverage and peace of mind for yacht owners, regardless of yacht type or navigation plans. Our specialty yacht insurance solutions include:
Boat & Yachts
–  Marine insurance solutions for all types of boats and yachts.
Mega Yachts
– Comprehensive protection for large luxury yachts that require highly specialized coverage.
Cruiser Insurance
– Tailored coverage for long-range and liveaboard cruisers, designed to protect you and your yacht on extended voyages and when living aboard.
One-Design Insurance
– Custom insurance policy for one-design sailboats under 30 feet, including racing coverage and worldwide navigation options.
Sailors Health Insurance
– Specialized health insurance solutions with worldwide overage for professional sailors, coaches, instructors, Olympic team members, collegiate sailing athletes, paid crew/captains, and international cruisers.
US Sailing Member Insurance Solutions
– Customized insurance offerings for US Sailing members including the Burgee Program for Yacht Clubs.
Tailored coverage for all of your marine needs
Navigating marine insurance doesn’t have to be complicated. Discover tailored solutions for
commercial marine insurance
or
yacht insurance
.

Industries
Marine Insurance
Comprehensive marine insurance solutions
At Risk Strategies, we provide specialized marine insurance solutions designed to safeguard your vessels, yachts, and maritime operations. Our team of marine insurance professionals brings extensive industry knowledge and a deep commitment to serving both the marine industry and individual yacht owners.
We partner with our marine clients to develop custom insurance solutions and risk management programs which provide optimal coverage and improved risk profiles without compromise.
Commercial marine insurance
Efficiently managing the risks of commercial marine operations requires specialized coverage crafted to meet the demands of the industry. Our comprehensive suite of solutions offers protection across a wide range of activities and assets:
Aquaculture
– Safeguard your aquaculture operations with coverage tailored to protect against environmental and operational risks.
Cargo & Transit Insurance Solutions
– Ensure your cargo remains protected during transit, whether by sea, land, or air.
Crew Medical Insurance
– Provide essential medical coverage for your crew, ensuring their wellbeing while operating at sea.
Hull & Machinery
– Protect your commercial vessels against physical damage to key components like the hull and machinery.
Marine Claims Service
– Depend on prompt, efficient claims services to minimize disruption to your operations.
Marine Construction
– Secure your marine construction projects with insurance designed for this specialized field.
Marine Liability
– Mitigate risks with comprehensive liability insurance for various marine operations.
Ports & Terminals
– Protect operational assets critical to maritime logistics at ports and terminals.
Protection & Indemnity
– Benefit from coverage that addresses third-party liabilities such as collisions, pollution, and passenger injuries.
Recreational Marine
– Comprehensive insurance for marine businesses tailored to address unique risks, coastal challenges, and complex exposures.
Yacht Club Insurance:
The Burgee Program - comprehensive insurance program developed to meet the distinctive needs of yacht clubs, community programs, and sailing organizations.
Yacht insurance
Yacht ownership is a reflection of your passion for the water and nautical lifestyle. Whether you own a mega yacht, sportfish boat, motor yacht, racing sailing boat, high-performance center console, or long-range trawler, we have the insurance solutions you need.
Our range of specialized offerings and custom insurance solutions ensure unmatched coverage and peace of mind for yacht owners, regardless of yacht type or navigation plans. Our specialty yacht insurance solutions include:
Boat & Yachts
–  Marine insurance solutions for all types of boats and yachts.
Mega Yachts
– Comprehensive protection for large luxury yachts that require highly specialized coverage.
Cruiser Insurance
– Tailored coverage for long-range and liveaboard cruisers, designed to protect you and your yacht on extended voyages and when living aboard.
One-Design Insurance
– Custom insurance policy for one-design sailboats under 30 feet, including racing coverage and worldwide navigation options.
Sailors Health Insurance
– Specialized health insurance solutions with worldwide overage for professional sailors, coaches, instructors, Olympic team members, collegiate sailing athletes, paid crew/captains, and international cruisers.
US Sailing Member Insurance Solutions
– Customized insurance offerings for US Sailing members including the Burgee Program for Yacht Clubs.
Tailored coverage for all of your marine needs
Navigating marine insurance doesn’t have to be complicated. Discover tailored solutions for
commercial marine insurance
or
yacht insurance

Industries
Marine Insurance
Comprehensive marine insurance solutions
At Risk Strategies, we provide specialized marine insurance solutions designed to safeguard your vessels, yachts, and maritime operations. Our team of marine insurance professionals brings extensive industry knowledge and a deep commitment to serving both the marine industry and individual yacht owners.
We partner with our marine clients to develop custom insurance solutions and risk management programs which provide optimal coverage and improved risk profiles without compromise.
Commercial marine insurance
Efficiently managing the risks of commercial marine operations requires specialized coverage crafted to meet the demands of the industry. Our comprehensive suite of solutions offers protection across a wide range of activities and assets:
Aquaculture
– Safeguard your aquaculture operations with coverage tailored to protect against environmental and operational risks.
Cargo & Transit Insurance Solutions
– Ensure your cargo remains protected during transit, whether by sea, land, or air.
Crew Medical Insurance
– Provide essential medical coverage for your crew, ensuring their wellbeing while operating at sea.
Hull & Machinery
– Protect your commercial vessels against physical damage to key components like the hull and machinery.
Marine Claims Service
– Depend on prompt, efficient claims services to minimize disruption to your operations.
Marine Construction
– Secure your marine construction projects with insurance designed for this specialized field.
Marine Liability
– Mitigate risks with comprehensive liability insurance for various marine operations.
Ports & Terminals
– Protect operational assets critical to maritime logistics at ports and terminals.
Protection & Indemnity
– Benefit from coverage that addresses third-party liabilities such as collisions, pollution, and passenger injuries.
Recreational Marine
– Comprehensive insurance for marine businesses tailored to address unique risks, coastal challenges, and complex exposures.
Yacht Club Insurance:
The Burgee Program - comprehensive insurance program developed to meet the distinctive needs of yacht clubs, community programs, and sailing organizations.
Yacht insurance
Yacht ownership is a reflection of your passion for the water and nautical lifestyle. Whether you own a mega yacht, sportfish boat, motor yacht, racing sailing boat, high-performance center console, or long-range trawler, we have the insurance solutions you need.
Our range of specialized offerings and custom insurance solutions ensure unmatched coverage and peace of mind for yacht owners, regardless of yacht type or navigation plans. Our specialty yacht insurance solutions include:
Boat & Yachts
–  Marine insurance solutions for all types of boats and yachts.
Mega Yachts
– Comprehensive protection for large luxury yachts that require highly specialized coverage.
Cruiser Insurance
– Tailored coverage for long-range and liveaboard cruisers, designed to protect you and your yacht on extended voyages and when living aboard.
One-Design Insurance
– Custom insurance policy for one-design sailboats under 30 feet, including racing coverage and worldwide navigation options.
Sailors Health Insurance
– Specialized health insurance solutions with worldwide overage for professional sailors, coaches, instructors, Olympic team members, collegiate sailing athletes, paid crew/captains, and international cruisers.
US Sailing Member Insurance Solutions
– Customized insurance offerings for US Sailing members including the Burgee Program for Yacht Clubs.
Tailored coverage for all of your marine needs
Navigating marine insurance doesn’t have to be complicated. Discover tailored solutions for
commercial marine insurance
or
yacht insurance
.

– Provide essential medical coverage for your crew, ensuring their wellbeing while operating at sea.
Hull & Machinery
– Protect your commercial vessels against physical damage to key components like the hull and machinery.
Marine Claims Service
– Depend on prompt, efficient claims services to minimize disruption to your operations.
Marine Construction
– Secure your marine construction projects with insurance designed for this specialized field.
Marine Liability
– Mitigate risks with comprehensive liability insurance for various marine operations.
Ports & Terminals
– Protect operational assets critical to maritime logistics at ports and terminals.
Protection & Indemnity
– Benefit from coverage that addresses third-party liabilities such as collisions, pollution, and passenger injuries.
Recreational Marine
– Comprehensive insurance for marine businesses tailored to address unique risks, coastal challenges, and complex exposures.
Yacht Club Insurance:
The Burgee Program - comprehensive insurance program developed to meet the distinctive needs of yacht clubs, community programs, and sailing organizations.
Yacht insurance
Yacht ownership is a reflection of your passion for the water and nautical lifestyle. Whether you own a mega yacht, sportfish boat, motor yacht, racing sailing boat, high-performance center console, or long-range trawler, we have the insurance solutions you need.
Our range of specialized offerings and custom insurance solutions ensure unmatched coverage and peace of mind for yacht owners, regardless of yacht type or navigation plans. Our specialty yacht insurance solutions include:
Boat & Yachts
–  Marine insurance solutions for all types of boats and yachts.
Mega Yachts
– Comprehensive protection for large luxury yachts that require highly specialized coverage.
Cruiser Insurance
– Tailored coverage for long-range and liveaboard cruisers, designed to protect you and your yacht on extended voyages and when living aboard.
One-Design Insurance
– Custom insurance policy for one-design sailboats under 30 feet, including racing coverage and worldwide navigation options.
Sailors Health Insurance
– Specialized health insurance solutions with worldwide overage for professional sailors, coaches, instructors, Olympic team members, collegiate sailing athletes, paid crew/captains, and international cruisers.
US Sailing Member Insurance Solutions
– Customized insurance offerings for US Sailing members including the Burgee Program for Yacht Clubs.
Tailored coverage for all of your marine needs
Navigating marine insurance doesn’t have to be complicated. Discover tailored solutions for
commercial marine insurance
or
yacht insurance

Industries
Marine Insurance
Comprehensive marine insurance solutions
At Risk Strategies, we provide specialized marine insurance solutions designed to safeguard your vessels, yachts, and maritime operations. Our team of marine insurance professionals brings extensive industry knowledge and a deep commitment to serving both the marine industry and individual yacht owners.
We partner with our marine clients to develop custom insurance solutions and risk management programs which provide optimal coverage and improved risk profiles without compromise.
Commercial marine insurance
Efficiently managing the risks of commercial marine operations requires specialized coverage crafted to meet the demands of the industry. Our comprehensive suite of solutions offers protection across a wide range of activities and assets:
Aquaculture
– Safeguard your aquaculture operations with coverage tailored to protect against environmental and operational risks.
Cargo & Transit Insurance Solutions
– Ensure your cargo remains protected during transit, whether by sea, land, or air.
Crew Medical Insurance
– Provide essential medical coverage for your crew, ensuring their wellbeing while operating at sea.
Hull & Machinery
– Protect your commercial vessels against physical damage to key components like the hull and machinery.
Marine Claims Service
– Depend on prompt, efficient claims services to minimize disruption to your operations.
Marine Construction
– Secure your marine construction projects with insurance designed for this specialized field.
Marine Liability
– Mitigate risks with comprehensive liability insurance for various marine operations.
Ports & Terminals
– Protect operational assets critical to maritime logistics at ports and terminals.
Protection & Indemnity
– Benefit from coverage that addresses third-party liabilities such as collisions, pollution, and passenger injuries.
Recreational Marine
– Comprehensive insurance for marine businesses tailored to address unique risks, coastal challenges, and complex exposures.
Yacht Club Insurance:
The Burgee Program - comprehensive insurance program developed to meet the distinctive needs of yacht clubs, community programs, and sailing organizations.

Boat & Yachts
–  Marine insurance solutions for all types of boats and yachts.
Mega Yachts
– Comprehensive protection for large luxury yachts that require highly specialized coverage.
Cruiser Insurance
– Tailored coverage for long-range and liveaboard cruisers, designed to protect you and your yacht on extended voyages and when living aboard.
One-Design Insurance
– Custom insurance policy for one-design sailboats under 30 feet, including racing coverage and worldwide navigation options.
Sailors Health Insurance

US Sailing Member Insurance Solutions

Industries
Marine Insurance
Comprehensive marine insurance solutions
At Risk Strategies, we provide specialized marine insurance solutions designed to safeguard your vessels, yachts, and maritime operations. Our team of marine insurance professionals brings extensive industry knowledge and a deep commitment to serving both the marine industry and individual yacht owners.
We partner with our marine clients to develop custom insurance solutions and risk management programs which provide optimal coverage and improved risk profiles without compromise.
Commercial marine insurance
Efficiently managing the risks of commercial marine operations requires specialized coverage crafted to meet the demands of the industry. Our comprehensive suite of solutions offers protection across a wide range of activities and assets:
Aquaculture
– Safeguard your aquaculture operations with coverage tailored to protect against environmental and operational risks.
Cargo & Transit Insurance Solutions
– Ensure your cargo remains protected during transit, whether by sea, land, or air.
Crew Medical Insurance
– Provide essential medical coverage for your crew, ensuring their wellbeing while operating at sea.
Hull & Machinery
– Protect your commercial vessels against physical damage to key components like the hull and machinery.
Marine Claims Service
– Depend on prompt, efficient claims services to minimize disruption to your operations.
Marine Construction
– Secure your marine construction projects with insurance designed for this specialized field.
Marine Liability
– Mitigate risks with comprehensive liability insurance for various marine operations.
Ports & Terminals
– Protect operational assets critical to maritime logistics at ports and terminals.
Protection & Indemnity
– Benefit from coverage that addresses third-party liabilities such as collisions, pollution, and passenger injuries.
Recreational Marine
– Comprehensive insurance for marine businesses tailored to address unique risks, coastal challenges, and complex exposures.
Yacht Club Insurance:
The Burgee Program - comprehensive insurance program developed to meet the distinctive needs of yacht clubs, community programs, and sailing organizations.
Yacht insurance
Yacht ownership is a reflection of your passion for the water and nautical lifestyle. Whether you own a mega yacht, sportfish boat, motor yacht, racing sailing boat, high-performance center console, or long-range trawler, we have the insurance solutions you need.
Our range of specialized offerings and custom insurance solutions ensure unmatched coverage and peace of mind for yacht owners, regardless of yacht type or navigation plans. Our specialty yacht insurance solutions include:
Boat & Yachts
–  Marine insurance solutions for all types of boats and yachts.
Mega Yachts
– Comprehensive protection for large luxury yachts that require highly specialized coverage.
Cruiser Insurance
– Tailored coverage for long-range and liveaboard cruisers, designed to protect you and your yacht on extended voyages and when living aboard.
One-Design Insurance
– Custom insurance policy for one-design sailboats under 30 feet, including racing coverage and worldwide navigation options.
Sailors Health Insurance
– Specialized health insurance solutions with worldwide overage for professional sailors, coaches, instructors, Olympic team members, collegiate sailing athletes, paid crew/captains, and international cruisers.
US Sailing Member Insurance Solutions
– Customized insurance offerings for US Sailing members including the Burgee Program for Yacht Clubs.
Tailored coverage for all of your marine needs
Navigating marine insurance doesn’t have to be complicated. Discover tailored solutions for
commercial marine insurance
or
yacht insurance
.

Industries
Marine Insurance
Comprehensive marine insurance solutions
At Risk Strategies, we provide specialized marine insurance solutions designed to safeguard your vessels, yachts, and maritime operations. Our team of marine insurance professionals brings extensive industry knowledge and a deep commitment to serving both the marine industry and individual yacht owners.
We partner with our marine clients to develop custom insurance solutions and risk management programs which provide optimal coverage and improved risk profiles without compromise.
Commercial marine insurance
Efficiently managing the risks of commercial marine operations requires specialized coverage crafted to meet the demands of the industry. Our comprehensive suite of solutions offers protection across a wide range of activities and assets:
Aquaculture
– Safeguard your aquaculture operations with coverage tailored to protect against environmental and operational risks.
Cargo & Transit Insurance Solutions
– Ensure your cargo remains protected during transit, whether by sea, land, or air.
Crew Medical Insurance
– Provide essential medical coverage for your crew, ensuring their wellbeing while operating at sea.
Hull & Machinery
– Protect your commercial vessels against physical damage to key components like the hull and machinery.
Marine Claims Service
– Depend on prompt, efficient claims services to minimize disruption to your operations.
Marine Construction
– Secure your marine construction projects with insurance designed for this specialized field.
Marine Liability
– Mitigate risks with comprehensive liability insurance for various marine operations.
Ports & Terminals
– Protect operational assets critical to maritime logistics at ports and terminals.
Protection & Indemnity
– Benefit from coverage that addresses third-party liabilities such as collisions, pollution, and passenger injuries.
Recreational Marine
– Comprehensive insurance for marine businesses tailored to address unique risks, coastal challenges, and complex exposures.
Yacht Club Insurance:
The Burgee Program - comprehensive insurance program developed to meet the distinctive needs of yacht clubs, community programs, and sailing organizations.
Yacht insurance
Yacht ownership is a reflection of your passion for the water and nautical lifestyle. Whether you own a mega yacht, sportfish boat, motor yacht, racing sailing boat, high-performance center console, or long-range trawler, we have the insurance solutions you need.
Our range of specialized offerings and custom insurance solutions ensure unmatched coverage and peace of mind for yacht owners, regardless of yacht type or navigation plans. Our specialty yacht insurance solutions include:
Boat & Yachts
–  Marine insurance solutions for all types of boats and yachts.
Mega Yachts
– Comprehensive protection for large luxury yachts that require highly specialized coverage.
Cruiser Insurance
– Tailored coverage for long-range and liveaboard cruisers, designed to protect you and your yacht on extended voyages and when living aboard.
One-Design Insurance
– Custom insurance policy for one-design sailboats under 30 feet, including racing coverage and worldwide navigation options.
Sailors Health Insurance
– Specialized health insurance solutions with worldwide overage for professional sailors, coaches, instructors, Olympic team members, collegiate sailing athletes, paid crew/captains, and international cruisers.
US Sailing Member Insurance Solutions
– Customized insurance offerings for US Sailing members including the Burgee Program for Yacht Clubs.
Tailored coverage for all of your marine needs
Navigating marine insurance doesn’t have to be complicated. Discover tailored solutions for
commercial marine insurance
or
yacht insurance
.

Industries
Marine Insurance
Comprehensive marine insurance solutions
At Risk Strategies, we provide specialized marine insurance solutions designed to safeguard your vessels, yachts, and maritime operations. Our team of marine insurance professionals brings extensive industry knowledge and a deep commitment to serving both the marine industry and individual yacht owners.
We partner with our marine clients to develop custom insurance solutions and risk management programs which provide optimal coverage and improved risk profiles without compromise.
Commercial marine insurance
Efficiently managing the risks of commercial marine operations requires specialized coverage crafted to meet the demands of the industry. Our comprehensive suite of solutions offers protection across a wide range of activities and assets:
Aquaculture
– Safeguard your aquaculture operations with coverage tailored to protect against environmental and operational risks.
Cargo & Transit Insurance Solutions
– Ensure your cargo remains protected during transit, whether by sea, land, or air.
Crew Medical Insurance
– Provide essential medical coverage for your crew, ensuring their wellbeing while operating at sea.
Hull & Machinery
– Protect your commercial vessels against physical damage to key components like the hull and machinery.
Marine Claims Service
– Depend on prompt, efficient claims services to minimize disruption to your operations.
Marine Construction
– Secure your marine construction projects with insurance designed for this specialized field.
Marine Liability
– Mitigate risks with comprehensive liability insurance for various marine operations.
Ports & Terminals
– Protect operational assets critical to maritime logistics at ports and terminals.
Protection & Indemnity
– Benefit from coverage that addresses third-party liabilities such as collisions, pollution, and passenger injuries.
Recreational Marine
– Comprehensive insurance for marine businesses tailored to address unique risks, coastal challenges, and complex exposures.
Yacht Club Insurance:
The Burgee Program - comprehensive insurance program developed to meet the distinctive needs of yacht clubs, community programs, and sailing organizations.
Yacht insurance
Yacht ownership is a reflection of your passion for the water and nautical lifestyle. Whether you own a mega yacht, sportfish boat, motor yacht, racing sailing boat, high-performance center console, or long-range trawler, we have the insurance solutions you need.
Our range of specialized offerings and custom insurance solutions ensure unmatched coverage and peace of mind for yacht owners, regardless of yacht type or navigation plans. Our specialty yacht insurance solutions include:
Boat & Yachts
–  Marine insurance solutions for all types of boats and yachts.
Mega Yachts
– Comprehensive protection for large luxury yachts that require highly specialized coverage.
Cruiser Insurance
– Tailored coverage for long-range and liveaboard cruisers, designed to protect you and your yacht on extended voyages and when living aboard.
One-Design Insurance
– Custom insurance policy for one-design sailboats under 30 feet, including racing coverage and worldwide navigation options.
Sailors Health Insurance
– Specialized health insurance solutions with worldwide overage for professional sailors, coaches, instructors, Olympic team members, collegiate sailing athletes, paid crew/captains, and international cruisers.
US Sailing Member Insurance Solutions
– Customized insurance offerings for US Sailing members including the Burgee Program for Yacht Clubs.
Tailored coverage for all of your marine needs
Navigating marine insurance doesn’t have to be complicated. Discover tailored solutions for
commercial marine insurance
or
yacht insurance

Industries
Marine Insurance
Comprehensive marine insurance solutions
At Risk Strategies, we provide specialized marine insurance solutions designed to safeguard your vessels, yachts, and maritime operations. Our team of marine insurance professionals brings extensive industry knowledge and a deep commitment to serving both the marine industry and individual yacht owners.
We partner with our marine clients to develop custom insurance solutions and risk management programs which provide optimal coverage and improved risk profiles without compromise.
Commercial marine insurance
Efficiently managing the risks of commercial marine operations requires specialized coverage crafted to meet the demands of the industry. Our comprehensive suite of solutions offers protection across a wide range of activities and assets:
Aquaculture
– Safeguard your aquaculture operations with coverage tailored to protect against environmental and operational risks.
Cargo & Transit Insurance Solutions
– Ensure your cargo remains protected during transit, whether by sea, land, or air.
Crew Medical Insurance
– Provide essential medical coverage for your crew, ensuring their wellbeing while operating at sea.
Hull & Machinery
– Protect your commercial vessels against physical damage to key components like the hull and machinery.
Marine Claims Service
– Depend on prompt, efficient claims services to minimize disruption to your operations.
Marine Construction
– Secure your marine construction projects with insurance designed for this specialized field.
Marine Liability
– Mitigate risks with comprehensive liability insurance for various marine operations.
Ports & Terminals
– Protect operational assets critical to maritime logistics at ports and terminals.
Protection & Indemnity
– Benefit from coverage that addresses third-party liabilities such as collisions, pollution, and passenger injuries.
Recreational Marine
– Comprehensive insurance for marine businesses tailored to address unique risks, coastal challenges, and complex exposures.
Yacht Club Insurance:
The Burgee Program - comprehensive insurance program developed to meet the distinctive needs of yacht clubs, community programs, and sailing organizations.
Yacht insurance
Yacht ownership is a reflection of your passion for the water and nautical lifestyle. Whether you own a mega yacht, sportfish boat, motor yacht, racing sailing boat, high-performance center console, or long-range trawler, we have the insurance solutions you need.
Our range of specialized offerings and custom insurance solutions ensure unmatched coverage and peace of mind for yacht owners, regardless of yacht type or navigation plans. Our specialty yacht insurance solutions include:
Boat & Yachts
–  Marine insurance solutions for all types of boats and yachts.
Mega Yachts
– Comprehensive protection for large luxury yachts that require highly specialized coverage.
Cruiser Insurance
– Tailored coverage for long-range and liveaboard cruisers, designed to protect you and your yacht on extended voyages and when living aboard.
One-Design Insurance
– Custom insurance policy for one-design sailboats under 30 feet, including racing coverage and worldwide navigation options.
Sailors Health Insurance
– Specialized health insurance solutions with worldwide overage for professional sailors, coaches, instructors, Olympic team members, collegiate sailing athletes, paid crew/captains, and international cruisers.
US Sailing Member Insurance Solutions
– Customized insurance offerings for US Sailing members including the Burgee Program for Yacht Clubs.
Tailored coverage for all of your marine needs
Navigating marine insurance doesn’t have to be complicated. Discover tailored solutions for
commercial marine insurance
or
yacht insurance
.

Industries
Marine Insurance
Comprehensive marine insurance solutions
At Risk Strategies, we provide specialized marine insurance solutions designed to safeguard your vessels, yachts, and maritime operations. Our team of marine insurance professionals brings extensive industry knowledge and a deep commitment to serving both the marine industry and individual yacht owners.
We partner with our marine clients to develop custom insurance solutions and risk management programs which provide optimal coverage and improved risk profiles without compromise.
Commercial marine insurance
Efficiently managing the risks of commercial marine operations requires specialized coverage crafted to meet the demands of the industry. Our comprehensive suite of solutions offers protection across a wide range of activities and assets:
Aquaculture
– Safeguard your aquaculture operations with coverage tailored to protect against environmental and operational risks.
Cargo & Transit Insurance Solutions
– Ensure your cargo remains protected during transit, whether by sea, land, or air.
Crew Medical Insurance
– Provide essential medical coverage for your crew, ensuring their wellbeing while operating at sea.
Hull & Machinery
– Protect your commercial vessels against physical damage to key components like the hull and machinery.
Marine Claims Service
– Depend on prompt, efficient claims services to minimize disruption to your operations.
Marine Construction
– Secure your marine construction projects with insurance designed for this specialized field.
Marine Liability
– Mitigate risks with comprehensive liability insurance for various marine operations.
Ports & Terminals
– Protect operational assets critical to maritime logistics at ports and terminals.
Protection & Indemnity
– Benefit from coverage that addresses third-party liabilities such as collisions, pollution, and passenger injuries.
Recreational Marine
– Comprehensive insurance for marine businesses tailored to address unique risks, coastal challenges, and complex exposures.
Yacht Club Insurance:
The Burgee Program - comprehensive insurance program developed to meet the distinctive needs of yacht clubs, community programs, and sailing organizations.
Yacht insurance
Yacht ownership is a reflection of your passion for the water and nautical lifestyle. Whether you own a mega yacht, sportfish boat, motor yacht, racing sailing boat, high-performance center console, or long-range trawler, we have the insurance solutions you need.
Our range of specialized offerings and custom insurance solutions ensure unmatched coverage and peace of mind for yacht owners, regardless of yacht type or navigation plans. Our specialty yacht insurance solutions include:
Boat & Yachts
–  Marine insurance solutions for all types of boats and yachts.
Mega Yachts
– Comprehensive protection for large luxury yachts that require highly specialized coverage.
Cruiser Insurance
– Tailored coverage for long-range and liveaboard cruisers, designed to protect you and your yacht on extended voyages and when living aboard.
One-Design Insurance
– Custom insurance policy for one-design sailboats under 30 feet, including racing coverage and worldwide navigation options.
Sailors Health Insurance
– Specialized health insurance solutions with worldwide overage for professional sailors, coaches, instructors, Olympic team members, collegiate sailing athletes, paid crew/captains, and international cruisers.
US Sailing Member Insurance Solutions
– Customized insurance offerings for US Sailing members including the Burgee Program for Yacht Clubs.
Tailored coverage for all of your marine needs
Navigating marine insurance doesn’t have to be complicated. Discover tailored solutions for
commercial marine insurance
or
yacht insurance

Industries
Crew Medical Insurance
Global health insurance solutions for international and domestic coverage
Risk Strategies understands your health insurance needs throughout the world. Once you leave the United States, or navigate into blue water, your domestic health insurance coverage may have large gaps in coverage. At Risk Strategies, we understand the coverage you need ‐ in and outside of the US ‐ and have the solutions to protect you around the globe. The programs are affordable and can be in compliance with the Affordable Care Act.
Medical insurance solutions for
Commercial fishermen
Paid crew & captains
International cruisers
Professional sailors
Expatriates
US Sailing members (learn more)
Coverage highlights include
Worldwide coverage
Medical evacuation
Accidental Death and Dismemberment
Prescription Coverage
Options with and without US coverage
Eligibility requirements include
Extended time spent navigating in blue water
Travel outside the US for extended periods of time
Working in and out of the US through the year
Questions and more information
Contact
CrewMedicalgowrie@risk-strategies.com
What makes this program so special for mariners?
This specialized health insurance program for US Sailing members provides worldwide coverage and includes AD&D (accident death and dismemberment), medical evacuation and bedside visitation coverages as well as all other health insurance coverage expected in the U.S. In addition, the program includes mPassport, a portable medical care access tool for use worldwide. The program is underwritten by Geo Blue
Who manages this crew medical health insurance program?
The program is managed by Gowrie Group. Rick Bagnall is the program manager; you can reach him at
rbagnall@risk-strategies.com
or 860.399.3634.
Who is eligible?
There are six general categories of sailors that may qualify for US Sailing’s group crew medical insurance program. (Please note: Current US Sailing membership is required.)
Certified US Sailing instructors
Collegiate sailing athletes
Members of US Olympic Sailing Team
Professional crew/captains
Paid race yachts crew
International cruisers
What if I am a US Sailing member, but I do not fit neatly into one of these categories?
Please contact Rick Bagnall at
rbagnall@risk-strategies.com
or 860.399.3634 to discuss
Does this policy offer coverage inside the United States, for the time periods when I am not abroad or offshore?
Yes, the policy offers coverage in the United States, using the Anthem network.
When can I enroll?
This is an annual insurance policy. US Sailing members can enroll in this program during Open Enrollment which runs from July 1st to August 31st. The policy period starts September 1st.
After Open Enrollment, enrollment is closed unless the US Sailing member has a qualifying event.
Can I enroll online?
Online enrollment is available only during the Open Enrollment period which runs from July 1st to August 31st. To enroll at other times, contact Rick Bagnall at
rbagnall@risk-strategies.com
or 860.399.3634. Please note that premiums are payable by credit card only.
Why are the premiums so low in the US Sailing Group crew medical program?
Several factors contribute to the low premiums in this program.
Many people covered in the program spend time outside of the United States for much of the year, and health insurance coverage is a lot less expensive overseas.
Many in the program have multiple sources of coverage (eg, paid crew typically have P&I from the vessel), thus the full exposure to risk is lower.
Within US Sailing’s membership base, the majority that qualifies for this coverage tend to be younger.
What is a qualifying event?
Benefit plans can be affected by life event changes, some of which qualify as an official change in status by the IRS. Generally, when you enroll in benefits as a new employee, you cannot make any changes until the next Open Enrollment period. However, if you experience a qualified change in status you can make mid-year changes. A qualifying event, also called a life event change, is a personal change in status which may allow you to change your benefit elections. Examples of some qualifying events include, but are not limited to, the following:
Change in legal marital status – marriage, divorce, legal separation, annulment, death of a spouse.
Change in number of dependents – birth, death, adoption, placement for adoption, award of legal guardianship.
Change in employment status of the employee’s spouse or employee’s dependent – switching from part-time to full-time employment status or from full-time to part-time, termination or commencement of employment, a strike or lockout, commencement of or return from an unpaid leave of absence which results in employee/dependent becoming ineligible for coverage.
Dependent satisfies or ceases to satisfy eligibility requirement – marriage of a dependent or change in student status.
How do I enroll if I have a qualifying event?
It is important to remember that if you experience a qualifying event, you will need to request a change to your benefits within 30 calendar days of the event and provide required documentation. If you do not request the change within 30 calendar days, the next opportunity you will have to make changes to your benefits will be during the next Open Enrollment period.
What if my US physician or hospital is not listed in Geo Blue’s online provider network?
The next step would be to call your Physician or Hospital directly and see if they are in the Anthem network. If they are in the Anthem network they should accept Geo Blue.
Can this insurance be offered as a group benefit to a team or group of sailors?
Yes. We can set up a group contract and supply a statement directly to your business. This allows employees the extra benefit of paying their premium through payroll deduction and receiving their benefits as a pre-tax benefit. In order to set up a group contract, please contact Rick Bagnall at
rbagnall@risk-strategies.com
or 860.399.3634
Who is the insurance carrier for this program?
Geo Blue is the carrier for the US Sailing group crew medical program. Founded in 1997, Geo Blue is a leading provider of international health insurance programs and an innovator in online healthcare information, medical assistance and insurance services around the globe. Geo Blue annually provides health insurance products or services to more than 650,000 individuals who travel, study or live outside of their home country. Geo Blue is 80% backed by Anthem Blue Cross & Blue Shield and 20% backed by Swiss Re. It is also important to know that Geo Blue is the only U.S. insurance carrier with a network of physicians and hospitals throughout the world, offering a service called "M Passport" to access these medical care providers. In the United States, Geo Blue uses the Anthem physician and hospital network.
What is Risk Strategies/Gowrie Group's role in the US Sailing health insurance plan?
Risk Strategies/Gowrie Group is US Sailing’s insurance partner and manages this health insurance program. Rick Bagnall runs the program for Risk Strategies/Gowrie Group and is the direct contact for all clients. Risk Strategies/Gowrie Group brings to US Sailing members insurance solutions for yacht clubs, one-design boats, cruising boats, health insurance, and more.

Industries
Marine Insurance
Comprehensive marine insurance solutions
At Risk Strategies, we provide specialized marine insurance solutions designed to safeguard your vessels, yachts, and maritime operations. Our team of marine insurance professionals brings extensive industry knowledge and a deep commitment to serving both the marine industry and individual yacht owners.
We partner with our marine clients to develop custom insurance solutions and risk management programs which provide optimal coverage and improved risk profiles without compromise.
Commercial marine insurance
Efficiently managing the risks of commercial marine operations requires specialized coverage crafted to meet the demands of the industry. Our comprehensive suite of solutions offers protection across a wide range of activities and assets:
Aquaculture
– Safeguard your aquaculture operations with coverage tailored to protect against environmental and operational risks.
Cargo & Transit Insurance Solutions
– Ensure your cargo remains protected during transit, whether by sea, land, or air.
Crew Medical Insurance
– Provide essential medical coverage for your crew, ensuring their wellbeing while operating at sea.
Hull & Machinery
– Protect your commercial vessels against physical damage to key components like the hull and machinery.
Marine Claims Service
– Depend on prompt, efficient claims services to minimize disruption to your operations.
Marine Construction
– Secure your marine construction projects with insurance designed for this specialized field.
Marine Liability
– Mitigate risks with comprehensive liability insurance for various marine operations.
Ports & Terminals
– Protect operational assets critical to maritime logistics at ports and terminals.
Protection & Indemnity
– Benefit from coverage that addresses third-party liabilities such as collisions, pollution, and passenger injuries.
Recreational Marine
– Comprehensive insurance for marine businesses tailored to address unique risks, coastal challenges, and complex exposures.
Yacht Club Insurance:
The Burgee Program - comprehensive insurance program developed to meet the distinctive needs of yacht clubs, community programs, and sailing organizations.
Yacht insurance
Yacht ownership is a reflection of your passion for the water and nautical lifestyle. Whether you own a mega yacht, sportfish boat, motor yacht, racing sailing boat, high-performance center console, or long-range trawler, we have the insurance solutions you need.
Our range of specialized offerings and custom insurance solutions ensure unmatched coverage and peace of mind for yacht owners, regardless of yacht type or navigation plans. Our specialty yacht insurance solutions include:
Boat & Yachts
–  Marine insurance solutions for all types of boats and yachts.
Mega Yachts
– Comprehensive protection for large luxury yachts that require highly specialized coverage.
Cruiser Insurance
– Tailored coverage for long-range and liveaboard cruisers, designed to protect you and your yacht on extended voyages and when living aboard.
One-Design Insurance
– Custom insurance policy for one-design sailboats under 30 feet, including racing coverage and worldwide navigation options.
Sailors Health Insurance
– Specialized health insurance solutions with worldwide overage for professional sailors, coaches, instructors, Olympic team members, collegiate sailing athletes, paid crew/captains, and international cruisers.
US Sailing Member Insurance Solutions
– Customized insurance offerings for US Sailing members including the Burgee Program for Yacht Clubs.
Tailored coverage for all of your marine needs
Navigating marine insurance doesn’t have to be complicated. Discover tailored solutions for
commercial marine insurance
or
yacht insurance
.

Industries
Marine Insurance
Comprehensive marine insurance solutions
At Risk Strategies, we provide specialized marine insurance solutions designed to safeguard your vessels, yachts, and maritime operations. Our team of marine insurance professionals brings extensive industry knowledge and a deep commitment to serving both the marine industry and individual yacht owners.
We partner with our marine clients to develop custom insurance solutions and risk management programs which provide optimal coverage and improved risk profiles without compromise.
Commercial marine insurance
Efficiently managing the risks of commercial marine operations requires specialized coverage crafted to meet the demands of the industry. Our comprehensive suite of solutions offers protection across a wide range of activities and assets:
Aquaculture
– Safeguard your aquaculture operations with coverage tailored to protect against environmental and operational risks.
Cargo & Transit Insurance Solutions
– Ensure your cargo remains protected during transit, whether by sea, land, or air.
Crew Medical Insurance
– Provide essential medical coverage for your crew, ensuring their wellbeing while operating at sea.
Hull & Machinery
– Protect your commercial vessels against physical damage to key components like the hull and machinery.
Marine Claims Service
– Depend on prompt, efficient claims services to minimize disruption to your operations.
Marine Construction
– Secure your marine construction projects with insurance designed for this specialized field.
Marine Liability
– Mitigate risks with comprehensive liability insurance for various marine operations.
Ports & Terminals
– Protect operational assets critical to maritime logistics at ports and terminals.
Protection & Indemnity
– Benefit from coverage that addresses third-party liabilities such as collisions, pollution, and passenger injuries.
Recreational Marine
– Comprehensive insurance for marine businesses tailored to address unique risks, coastal challenges, and complex exposures.
Yacht Club Insurance:
The Burgee Program - comprehensive insurance program developed to meet the distinctive needs of yacht clubs, community programs, and sailing organizations.
Yacht insurance
Yacht ownership is a reflection of your passion for the water and nautical lifestyle. Whether you own a mega yacht, sportfish boat, motor yacht, racing sailing boat, high-performance center console, or long-range trawler, we have the insurance solutions you need.
Our range of specialized offerings and custom insurance solutions ensure unmatched coverage and peace of mind for yacht owners, regardless of yacht type or navigation plans. Our specialty yacht insurance solutions include:
Boat & Yachts
–  Marine insurance solutions for all types of boats and yachts.
Mega Yachts
– Comprehensive protection for large luxury yachts that require highly specialized coverage.
Cruiser Insurance
– Tailored coverage for long-range and liveaboard cruisers, designed to protect you and your yacht on extended voyages and when living aboard.
One-Design Insurance
– Custom insurance policy for one-design sailboats under 30 feet, including racing coverage and worldwide navigation options.
Sailors Health Insurance
– Specialized health insurance solutions with worldwide overage for professional sailors, coaches, instructors, Olympic team members, collegiate sailing athletes, paid crew/captains, and international cruisers.
US Sailing Member Insurance Solutions
– Customized insurance offerings for US Sailing members including the Burgee Program for Yacht Clubs.
Tailored coverage for all of your marine needs
Navigating marine insurance doesn’t have to be complicated. Discover tailored solutions for
commercial marine insurance
or
yacht insurance

Industries
Marine Insurance
Comprehensive marine insurance solutions
At Risk Strategies, we provide specialized marine insurance solutions designed to safeguard your vessels, yachts, and maritime operations. Our team of marine insurance professionals brings extensive industry knowledge and a deep commitment to serving both the marine industry and individual yacht owners.
We partner with our marine clients to develop custom insurance solutions and risk management programs which provide optimal coverage and improved risk profiles without compromise.
Commercial marine insurance
Efficiently managing the risks of commercial marine operations requires specialized coverage crafted to meet the demands of the industry. Our comprehensive suite of solutions offers protection across a wide range of activities and assets:
Aquaculture
– Safeguard your aquaculture operations with coverage tailored to protect against environmental and operational risks.
Cargo & Transit Insurance Solutions
– Ensure your cargo remains protected during transit, whether by sea, land, or air.
Crew Medical Insurance
– Provide essential medical coverage for your crew, ensuring their wellbeing while operating at sea.
Hull & Machinery
– Protect your commercial vessels against physical damage to key components like the hull and machinery.
Marine Claims Service
– Depend on prompt, efficient claims services to minimize disruption to your operations.
Marine Construction
– Secure your marine construction projects with insurance designed for this specialized field.
Marine Liability
– Mitigate risks with comprehensive liability insurance for various marine operations.
Ports & Terminals
– Protect operational assets critical to maritime logistics at ports and terminals.
Protection & Indemnity
– Benefit from coverage that addresses third-party liabilities such as collisions, pollution, and passenger injuries.
Recreational Marine
– Comprehensive insurance for marine businesses tailored to address unique risks, coastal challenges, and complex exposures.
Yacht Club Insurance:
The Burgee Program - comprehensive insurance program developed to meet the distinctive needs of yacht clubs, community programs, and sailing organizations.
Yacht insurance
Yacht ownership is a reflection of your passion for the water and nautical lifestyle. Whether you own a mega yacht, sportfish boat, motor yacht, racing sailing boat, high-performance center console, or long-range trawler, we have the insurance solutions you need.
Our range of specialized offerings and custom insurance solutions ensure unmatched coverage and peace of mind for yacht owners, regardless of yacht type or navigation plans. Our specialty yacht insurance solutions include:
Boat & Yachts
–  Marine insurance solutions for all types of boats and yachts.
Mega Yachts
– Comprehensive protection for large luxury yachts that require highly specialized coverage.
Cruiser Insurance
– Tailored coverage for long-range and liveaboard cruisers, designed to protect you and your yacht on extended voyages and when living aboard.
One-Design Insurance
– Custom insurance policy for one-design sailboats under 30 feet, including racing coverage and worldwide navigation options.
Sailors Health Insurance
– Specialized health insurance solutions with worldwide overage for professional sailors, coaches, instructors, Olympic team members, collegiate sailing athletes, paid crew/captains, and international cruisers.
US Sailing Member Insurance Solutions
– Customized insurance offerings for US Sailing members including the Burgee Program for Yacht Clubs.
Tailored coverage for all of your marine needs
Navigating marine insurance doesn’t have to be complicated. Discover tailored solutions for
commercial marine insurance
or
yacht insurance
.

SpaceX’s satellite internet service provides fast download speeds for coastal cruisers, and global coverage isn’t far off.

Next
Is AI Coming for Boating?
Spoiler Alert: The revolution is already well underway.

Yamaha’s wireless Helm Master system allows you to dock your boat from anywhere aboard.

Transducer Installation Tips for Clear Sonar Performance

Inlets can be tricky. Here’s some expert advice to help you avoid a harrowing tale.

Garmin’s inReach Messenger Plus keeps offshore boaters connected with global messaging and SOS features, offering peace of mind for those away from home.

Volvo Penta Dock Assist Demonstration

Special Report: Wind Farms and Their Effect on Boating
Is the wind farm apocalypse nigh? That depends on who you talk to and where your interests and priorities lie.
The Ditch App
An AI twist on chart plotting adds historical data to the mix.
Garmin at FLIBS 2023
If you think Garmin just makes MFDs you’ve been living under a rock. Learn what’s new with the American electronics giant.
How to Add Wireless Charging to Your Boat
Throw that old cord away! Luddite Mike Smith tells us why you’ll never go back to a plug-in charger again.
How To: Add Digital Switching to Your Boat
Going digital is easy. Mike Smith, a self professed Luddite, shares some tech tips.
The Screen Comes Alive
Wish you had superpowers? You’ll spot fish like Superman through a wall, with the Garmin Livescope XR.
Garmin Showcases Boat Switch
Digital switching is ubiquitous with the new boat market; Garmin’s Boat Switch brings it to the used boat masses.
SpaceX’s Starlink Internet Service Works on Boats
SpaceX’s satellite internet service provides fast download speeds for coastal cruisers, and global coverage isn’t far off.

Caring for engines after a not-too-long hiatus.
How do I check for engines damaged by forgetting to open seacocks?
April 1, 2012
I left my marina with my seacocks closed…

January 1, 2012
Should we do end-of-season oil changes or can we stretch the old oil into the next season?
How do I care for my unused engine?
November 1, 2011
I plan on being away from my boat for two to three months and during that time, I plan on having someone periodically run my diesels dockside…
Does an increase in horsepower explain a rise in exhaust temperature?
October 1, 2011
Question: I have a 1989 38-foot Bayliner with twin 175-hp Hino diesels that have been retrofitted with turbochargers, thus raising each engine to 210 horsepower. As I go from cruise to wide-open throttle (approximately 23 mph at 2800 rpm), turbo exhaust temperatures increase from 700F to 950F on the port engine and 850F on the starboard. When
Can switching motor oil viscosity harm my engine?
September 30, 2011
Question: The boys at the Ko Olina harbor are having a heated discussion concerning motor oil. Since Costco hit town, we’ve all been able to buy Chevron 15W-40 Delo 400 heavy-duty motor oil at ridiculously low prices. But what about the older engines we’ve been using straight 40W Delo 400 and other single-viscosity products in for years? Can we
Using synthetic oils in older engines
August 1, 2011
Question: I own a 1996 43-foot Hatteras with twin six-cylinder Detroit Diesel engines. I change the oil approximately every 100 hours of operation. At this point, I have 1,200 hours on each diesel and so far have only used non-synthetic oil. Is a synthetic or a blend of synthetic and regular oil contraindicated for this aged engine for any
Vintage Yanmars Running Hot
June 1, 2011
Question: I have a 29 Phoenix with twin, 1984-vintage, 170-hp Yanmar diesels with 1,000 hours on them. While the boat seems to run fine, I have one issue. During operation, the temperature of each engine rises normally at first but then keeps on going, not to the point of setting off alarms, but close. Pegging the engines (i.e., throttling them
Idling diesel engines
May 1, 2011
Question: My mechanic friends tell me not to let my diesel engine idle for long. They say that it should either be under load or turned off. I hear a lot of diesel engines in trucks idling at truck stops for hours though. Is there a difference in the two types of diesel engines or are my mechanic friends mistaken
Trouble-shooting an overheating boat engine
April 1, 2011
Question: I have a 1990 Carver Yacht with two 375-hp Caterpillar 3208 diesels. The starboard engine works fine, but at 2000 rpm the port engine overheats. Once the temperature hits 200F, I slow down to prevent damage and everything returns to normal.
Seasonal Storage For Fuel Tanks
March 1, 2011
Question: When I took your one-day Introductory Diesel Maintenance Course several years ago, I forgot to ask one question: What is the best way to lay up a fuel tank for seasonal storage? For years now, I’ve been topping off my tanks when fall lay-up comes around in order to reduce the air space above the fuel and thus minimize algae growth. Just
Aluminum in engine oil
February 1, 2011
Question: I just did my first oil analysis on my Cummins 6BTA diesel, and the results seem somewhat disconcerting. According to the report, there was aluminum in the oil at 28 ppm (parts per million) and iron at 20 ppm. The oil that was tested had approximately 43 engine hours on it. And since I bought my boat some nine years ago, I have
Caterpillar 3208 low rpm
January 1, 2011
Question: I have a 1989 Sea Ray with 375-hp Caterpillar 3208 diesels. Last year I overheated one of them and blew a head gasket. Overheating had been a problem for some time prior, incidentally. Anyway, I determined shortly thereafter that the gasket had blown into the cylinder although no cooling fluid had escaped. So I hired a diesel shop to
Onan genset spewing black smoke
December 1, 2010
Question: I have a 4-kW Marine Onan genset with 600 hours on it. If I let it run for a lengthy period it produces so much black smoke that a residue discolors the hull around the exhaust port. A year ago, I cleaned the heat exchanger and installed a new raw-water pump. There are no overheating issues. Do I have an injector or rack problem?—Charlie Carpenter, Morristown, New
Noisy Engines
November 1, 2010
Question: I have a pair of Detroit Diesel 6-71 TIBs in my 1990 Ocean 48 Super Sport. I love both the boat and the motors, but the Detroits have always been loud at the exhaust end of things. As I grow older, this noise is starting to bother me, particularly at times when I have to shout to be heard on the flying bridge at cruise speed. Muffler companies tell me that modern

Special Report: Bad Boating at Haulover Inlet
January 22, 2025
Like many of you we’ve watched more videos from Haulover Inlet than we want our boss to know about. Videos of stuffed bows, near disasters and plain bad boating can be strangely addicting, especially if you get sucked into the comment section. We had a conversation with a member of the U.S. Coast Guard’s 7th District to breakdown some of the biggest fails on social media.
Volvo Penta Launches Joystick Driving
June 6, 2023
Just when you thought Volvo Penta’s joystick couldn’t get any better, the company launches Joystick Driving, which allows you to shift, control the throttle and steer at speed all from your helm seat. Does this spell the end of the steering wheel and throttles as we know it?

Waterfront: Little Fish, Big Memories

Charlie Levine hosts a DADS (Dads Appreciating Down Syndrome) fishing trip in Florida, where the haul is small and the memories are anything but.
CraigCat Adventure Catamaran
November 8, 2024
At the boat shows, we’re always on the lookout for unique vessels. Invented by Erik and Robert Craig nearly 30 years ago and refined through all those years, these speedy little 30-horsepower, joystick-steered catamarans feature super-stable and tough roto-molded and foam-filled pontoons, rod holders, a bimini and plenty of other options. They, frankly, look like a blast to rip around on, or cast from in inches of shallow water. Have a closer look with Senior Editor Chris Dixon.
Regulator 25 Walkthrough
November 7, 2024
Built on a deep-V platform and powered with twin 250-hp Yamahas, the Regulator 25 is ready to head offshore. Step aboard for a first look at the 2024 Fort Lauderdale Show.
Viking 74 Walkthrough
November 2, 2024
One of the stars of the 2024 Fort Lauderdale Show is undoubtedly Viking’s new 74, which replaces their popular 72. 60 years of dedication to building a better boat is certainly on display here.
Grady-White Freedom 345 Walkthrough
October 31, 2024
The latest dual console model from Grady-White offers big boat features along with fishability and entertaining space. Walkthrough the Grady-White Freedom 345 at her Ft Lauderdale debut.
Formula 457 CCF
October 9, 2024
The feature-filled Formula 457 Fish center console is much more than a fishing boat.

Invented by Erik and Robert Craig nearly 30 years ago and refined through all those years, these speedy little 30-horsepower, joystick-steered catamarans feature super-stable and tough roto-molded and foam-filled pontoons, rod holders, a bimini and plenty of other options.
